title: Video : Nia Christopher Scores In Towson Win
body_text:
Video: Nia Christopher Scores In Towson Win
Bermudian footballer Nia Christopher continues her impressive form, scoring to help her Towson University team win another match.
The University’s match report said, “Towson women’s soccer moved their win streak to five and unbeaten streak to six in a 3-0 win against Stony Brook on Thursday night. The Tigers got a pair of late first half goals and never looked back in the win.
“Towson outshot the Seawolves 9-1 in the opening 45 minutes. Nia Christopher, Maja Hansson and Phoebe Canoles all scored for the Tigers in the win.
“Nia Christopher has now scored in her last three games and has a point in her last five.”
